text: MasyaAllah, a beautiful and lively mosque. The mosque is clean and very well maintained. For men on the ground floor and during Ramadan for women on the top floor (there is a place for ablution & toilet). Access can be by stairs or lift.
Been to this mosque almost 15 years ago and Alhamdulillah managed to come to this mosque after so many years.....still looks same like years ago but interior looks brighter and newer.....

Organized for Friday prayers, parking is a bit limited but I was lucky, Friday prayers starts at 1:30, there is screens with English translation for Khutba, plenty of expanded areas all the way to 4th floor,

Masjid Mujahideen is beautiful and equally spacious masjid located in Queenstown, Singapore. Like other Masjids of Singapore, Mujahideen has a unique architecture and is located at the corner of a a road crossing thereby easy to locate. Mujahideen has a play area for kids as well as an inbuilt restaurant, where one can have a sumptuous meal “nasi lemak” and “teh tarek”.
I walked from Park Hotel Alexandra to this masjid, around 15 minutes, at Isya time. This masjid is located at the corner, so easy to find. Clean and comfort for pray.
